response.original_title: Storie vere - Lilli Carati, una vita da eroina
response.overview: Filmed in 1994 while the actress was in a clinic to detox from heroin, Rony Daopoulos' portrait of Lilli Carati for the television program “Storie vere” (True Stories) ideally closes the circle of the F For Femmine cycle that began with Frammenti di una vita da eroina (Fragments of a Heroin's Life), filmed by Daopoulos herself with Annabella Miscuglio in 1976, starring the poet Patrizia Vicinelli. An intimate and passionate portrait without moralizing.
response.title: True Stories - Lili Carati, Fragments of a Heroin's Life
